source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003160_ALISAIE<tab>When I looked Father in the eye and swore we'd find a way to avert this tragedy...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003160_ALISAIE<tab>それから、お父様に言ったこと……
走っていく姿を、ちゃんと見ててほしいって話。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003170_ALISAIE<tab>It wasn't a promise just for him. It was a promise for you, too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003170_ALISAIE<tab>あれ、あなたにも言ってるんだからね。
そっちも、約束！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003180_THANCRED<tab>Evening. I hoped you hadn't crawled beneath the covers just yet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003180_THANCRED<tab>ああ、休もうってときに、悪いな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003190_THANCRED<tab>If you'll indulge me for a moment, I have a favor to ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003190_THANCRED<tab>お前に折り入って頼みがあるんだが……
今、大丈夫か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003200_THANCRED<tab>Don't worry. Nothing desperate or dire, if that's what you were wondering. Not yet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003200_THANCRED<tab>助かる……。
なに、身構えずとも、悪い報せってわけじゃないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003210_THANCRED<tab>You know, we may have quite literally entered our final days. The ancients went so far as to call it that for a reason.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003210_THANCRED<tab>……まだ先は見通せないが、
俺たちはこれから、終末の災厄に抗うことになるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003220_THANCRED<tab>If so, then everything we did for Ryne, for the First...will have been meaningless. And I can't accept that. I just can't.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003220_THANCRED<tab>それにあたって、だ。
ウリエンジェの言っていたとおり、
俺は、第一世界を……リーンを見捨てる選択はできない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003230_THANCRED<tab>My mind won't allow for the possibility...and that could be a problem. When we're in the thick of it, I don't know if I've got it in me to be pragmatic this time. To run...even if running's the right choice. The only choice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003230_THANCRED<tab>だからこそ、冷静な状況判断ができるか怪しい。
引き上げどきが来たとしても、それを認めないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003240_THANCRED<tab>So if you see me turning a blind eye to the harsh reality...beat some sense into me, would you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003240_THANCRED<tab>そうなったときは……
躊躇はいらない、ブン殴ってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003250_THANCRED<tab>I trust you and the other Scions with my life, and I'd like to think the feeling is at least occasionally mutual.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003250_THANCRED<tab>「暁」の連中は、なんだかんだ、
お前も含めて付き合いがいいからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003260_THANCRED<tab>And I'd never forgive myself if my stubbornness put them in danger.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003260_THANCRED<tab>今のうちに頼んでおかないと、
気づいたら全員そろって負け戦に身を投じてた……
なんてことになりかねない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003270_THANCRED<tab>Gods, listen to me. I'm beginning to sound like the father I never had.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003270_THANCRED<tab>……まったく、そんな心配ができるだなんて、
俺もずいぶん贅沢者になったもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003280_THANCRED<tab>So, can I count on you to keep me in line? I can think of no one else more eminently qualified.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003280_THANCRED<tab>で、引き受けてもらえるか？
俺としては、いちばん頼れる奴に依頼しに来たんだが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003290_THANCRED<tab>Excellent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003290_THANCRED<tab>フッ、交渉成立だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003300_THANCRED<tab>Now I can breathe a bit easier. Which isn't to say that I will, given what we're up against.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003300_THANCRED<tab>おかげで、少しばかり気が軽くなった。
あとは俺にできることを、やり尽くすだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003310_THANCRED<tab>Let's keep this little chat our secret. I'd rather not have anyone scolding us for burning the midnight oil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003310_THANCRED<tab>それじゃ、また休憩のあとでな。
俺が訪ねてきたことは内緒にしておいてくれよ？
休めと言っておきながら……って叱られそうだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>You're still awake. Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>こんばんは、起きていてくれてよかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>Might I trouble you to stand still for a moment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>とりあえず……そのまま、動かないでいてもらえて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>Hmmm. Nothing appears out of the ordinary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>……問題はなさそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>A precautionary measure. You will recall that serving as a vessel for abundant Light in the First very nearly ended poorly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>ほら、あなた、第一世界で戦っていたときに、
大罪喰いが放出した光をため込んでいたでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>In your recent battle on the moon, you were almost certainly exposed to similar, if not greater forces. Fortunately, from what I can see, you and your aether are none the worse for wear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>そういう前科があるから、
ゾディアークを倒しても異変がなかったか、
改めて視ておこうと思ったのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that Ryne were here to confirm my assessment...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>リーンがいない以上、
気づいてあげられるのは私くらいでしょうしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>To think you actually found yourself in a direct confrontation with Zodiark...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>仕方のない状況だったとはいえ、
あのゾディアークと真っ向勝負だなんて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>As if Zenos gallivanting about in your body was not misfortune enough. Did you so grossly offend every single deity in a past life that they saw fit to place a curse upon your soul?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>その前は別人の身体に入れられていたし、
あなた、何か物騒な呪いでもかけられているのではなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, that was in poor taste. I recall vividly how battered and broken it was in the depths of Amaurot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>……というのは冗談だとしても。
第一世界で、アーモロートを訪れたころのあなたの魂は、
本当に亀裂だらけだったのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that you could have seen it with your own eyes. Mayhap then you would understand why the greater part of me is glad you did not. It was...a horror beyond description.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>見せられるものなら、戒めに見せてあげたいくらい。
私はもう二度と……あんな痛々しいもの、視たくないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>Promise me you will be careful. That you will seek my counsel if you feel unwell.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>わかったら、ときには自分を大事になさいな。
それから、何かあったら相談すること。
……理解できて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>That puts my heart at ease, if only a touch. I suspect it will grow colder as the night wears on, so do be sure to stay warm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>なら、私は退散するわ。
シャーレアンの夜は冷えるから、あたたかくして、
きちんとベッドに入って眠るのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Sleep well, and may the shadows keep you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>アジントタ……よい夜を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003450_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, apologies. I-I didn't mean to... Ahem. If you could spare a moment before bed...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003450_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、ええと、急にすまない……！
あんたに話があってだな……その、少し、いいか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you. I fear this may be the last quiet night we have to talk for quite some time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>よかった……。
しばらく、落ち着いて話せる夜は、
来ないかもしれないと思ったからさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>I am...troubled, of late. Unwarranted concerns, perhaps. I hope. Nevertheless, I feel compelled to share them with you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>……これから話すことは、オレの勝手な心配だ。
杞憂で済むなら、それはそれで構わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>Though you have bested your enemies thus far─Zenos, and even Zodiark─your victories have come at a considerable cost to yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>ゼノスがあんたと戦うために、多くの犠牲を出したこと。
そして、ゾディアークの消滅に立ち会ってしまったこと……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>No one is without their limits─and you are no exception. I worry the added weight of the Final Days will prove more than you can bear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>その事実が、あんたを締めつけるときが来るかもしれない。
これから本当に災厄が起こるんだとしたら、なおのことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>It is surely too much for any one <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>だから、オレは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>But you needn't bear it alone. Let me share your burden.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたが生きることで背負った重荷を、
あんたが生きることを願ったオレにも、わけてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>My, um...carrying capacity pales in comparison to yours, but I could still help. Shoulder the occasional satchel from your ever-growing mountain of, um...baggage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>すべてを肩代わりできないとしても、
一緒に歩いて、ときどき荷物を預かれる奴がいるってこと、
忘れないでいてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>You have already done so much to help relieve me of mine own encumbrances. 'Tis only fair that I repay you in kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>幸い、オレは今、あんたのおかげですごく身軽なんだ。
……少しくらいは、わかちあわせてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course, it needn't be only troubles we share.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>そのかわり、嬉しいこともわけてもらうからな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>Moments of joy may seem few and far between now, but there will come a time when we look back fondly on this journey.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>良い出来事ばかりじゃないが……それでもきっと、
オレはいつかこの戦いを、輝かしかった日々として思い返すよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>The inquiry at the Forum, our march through the snows of Garlemald, our impromptu dinner in this very room─all of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>みんなと査問会に掛けられたことや、雪中の行軍、
この部屋で夕飯を食ったことだって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003570_GRAHATIA<tab>And that is to say nothing of the journeys yet to come. To the ends of the world and beyond!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003570_GRAHATIA<tab>そういうのを、これからもたくさんもらうんだ。
冒険に連れてってくれるって言ったのはあんたなんだから、
覚悟しろよな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003580_GRAHATIA<tab>Ahem. But tomorrow will be no less busy than today, and I have kept you from your rest long enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003580_GRAHATIA<tab>は、話はそれだけだ……貴重な休みを邪魔して悪かった……。
明日からに備えて、今夜はよく休んでくれ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003590_GRAHATIA<tab>Sleep well, my friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003590_GRAHATIA<tab>それじゃあ、おやすみ。
……良い夢を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>You're alone... Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>……よう、邪魔するぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003610_ESTINIEN<tab>The twins thought now would be a wonderful time to pay a visit to my chambers. Rather than listen to them bicker over tonight's snacks and tomorrow's plans, I seized the first opportunity to make my escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003610_ESTINIEN<tab>アルフィノとアリゼーが部屋に押しかけてきてな。
やれメシを食えだの支度をしろだの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>To their credit, they decided against intruding on your peace and quiet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>面倒になったから、逃げてきた。
案の定、今日はこっちの方が静かそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>It can all be a bit...exhausting at times, can't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>まったく……お前たちはよくやるもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>I wasn't sure what to make of you at first. During the Dragonsong War, how quick you were to take up a cause not your own. But I came to see that is simply the way of you and yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>竜詩戦争に飛び込んできたときもそうだったが、
あれと負けず劣らずの厄介事に、
こうも首を突っ込んでいくとはな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003650_ESTINIEN<tab>I will not pretend to understand this talk of ancient primals and the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003650_ESTINIEN<tab>俺は正直、いにしえの蛮神だの、終末の災厄だのに、
理解が及んじゃいない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003660_ESTINIEN<tab>But I trust in your judgment and choose to believe in your cause. You and Alphinaud have my lance. Now and always.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003660_ESTINIEN<tab>ただ、アルフィノの……
お前たちの信念に槍を貸したんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003670_ESTINIEN<tab>You will need it, wrack and ruin looming on the horizon. Calamity bearing down upon us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003670_ESTINIEN<tab>必要とされているかぎり、それを振るうだけだ。
これから始まる戦いが、どれだけ絶望的なものであってもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003680_ESTINIEN<tab>There's no place I'd rather be than here. Standing shoulder to shoulder with friends on the front line.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003680_ESTINIEN<tab>だからまあ、そうだな……
俺は俺で、納得してここに立ってるってわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>So do not hesitate to send me against your enemies. I'll make them rue the day they met me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>気にせず、使い倒すつもりで使え。
戦果だけは、十分に上げてやるさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003700_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, if you'll excuse me. I could do with a little air.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003700_ESTINIEN<tab>さてと……そろそろ追手が掛かるころか。
悪いが、通らせてもらうぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003710_ESTINIEN<tab>If Alphinaud asks... I was never here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003710_ESTINIEN<tab>もしアルフィノたちが来たら「知らない」で通せよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>Until the morrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>じゃあな、相棒。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003730_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>A short while earlier, in the Ala Mhigan Quarter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003730_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>しばらく前  アラミガン・クォーター

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Thank the gods that tower is gone. The sight of it was enough to make me sick...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>ここから見えていた、あの不気味な塔……
消えてくれて本当によかったわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003750_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Thank the Ilsabard Contingent, more like. Word is they fought their way into Garlemald and toppled the bloody thing themselves. Not just the one, neither─all the towers have up and vanished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003750_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>なんでも、例のイルサバード派遣団が、
帝都で元凶を排除したらしい。
それで、各地の塔もキレイサッパリだそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003760_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Aye, I heard the same. Commander Aldynn and his troops helped keep casualties to a minimum, too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003760_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>ありがたいわ……。
ラウバーン様たちが防備を固めてくれていたのもあって、
大きな被害が出なかったのが、不幸中の幸いよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003770_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>But is it true they brought back tempered Garlean soldiers?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003770_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>でも、派遣団といえば、
ガレマルドから帝国人のテンパードを大勢連れてきたとか……。
大丈夫なのかしら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003780_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>As Commander Aldynn tells it, they've a treatment for that now. But don't you worry─cured or not, they've no plans to bring them into the city proper.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003780_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>ラウバーン様の説明によると、
エオルゼア諸国で分担して彼らの治療にあたるらしいが、
うちには当面、迎え入れる予定はないらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003790_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>I see. Well, that's a relief, then.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003790_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>そう……。
褒められたことじゃないでしょうけど、
少し安心しちゃったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003800_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>I know we've brothers and sisters among the lot, but I can't say I'm eager to welcome them home...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003800_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>同じアラミゴ人の中でだって、帝国に与していた人たちと、
どう向き合ったらいいのか悩むことがあるもの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003810_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Won't need to think about it for a while yet. They're to be looked after in Ala Gannha for the time being...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003810_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>そうだな……。
アラガーナの長が中心になって、
そのあたりを支援する活動が始まったとは聞くが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003820_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Ishgard...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003820_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方  イシュガルド――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003830_ERENVILLE<tab>Another day, another commission of paramount importance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003830_ERENVILLE<tab>……こりゃあ、また、ずいぶんと大胆なご依頼だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003840_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, what have we here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003840_ERENVILLE<tab>さて、どうしたもんか……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003850_ERENVILLE<tab>Hm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003850_ERENVILLE<tab>……ん？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003860_ERENVILLE<tab>Hey! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003860_ERENVILLE<tab>おい、大丈夫か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003870_ERENVILLE<tab>Was that...? No. The shadows play tricks. Nothing more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003870_ERENVILLE<tab>今、何か……気のせいか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003880_ERENVILLE<tab>The towers are gone, and the Garlean threat has abated. And yet...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003880_ERENVILLE<tab>各地の塔は消え去って、
帝国の動向も落ち着きを見せはじめた……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003890_ERENVILLE<tab>Why does it feel as though it's about to get much, much worse...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003890_ERENVILLE<tab>だってのに、どうにも空気が重たいのは……何だ？
